oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ROBUST CONTROLLERS FOR NONLINEAR CHEMICAL PROCESSES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAO, YSNM
BHAT, J
CHIDAMBARAM, M
MADHAVAN, KP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: linearization
reactor
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The design of robust nonlinear feedback-feedforward controllers for state-variable nonlinear systems x = f(x) + g(x)u + d(t) and y = h(x) is presented. The controller is robust to modelling errors and disturbances occurring in the system. This is illustrated with a composition control of semi-batch copolymerization reactors.
